tutorial.speak:
To add people to the data base navigate to the B1.church Admin dashboard.
To add a new person, Choose People
Click the "Add Person" button to open the new person form.
Fill in the person's details including their first name, last name, and email address and click add.
To edit the person’s file go back to the data base and click on their name.
To complete their file click on the edit pencil by their name and fill in their information
To add household members click on the edit pencil on the right side of the household box .
Choose the status of the person
Click add to add another family member
Type the person’s name to find them in the data base.
If they are not in the data base you can add a new name.
Type in the name and e-mail address and click add
Be sure to click save
Now go back and search for the person you just added
Click select
Choose their status and click save
